title: Ep 4: Macaroni & Hot Dogs
description:
Today's Proceedings:  A girlfriend sick of her anime obsessed boyfriend and a girl sick of her friend's tinder dates ruining her party.  We also judge ourselves HEAVILY in this episode, including Christian's favorite meal: Macaroni & Hotdogs.


Support this podcast: https://anchor.fm/the-judgies/support
